item.description:
Please come no matter what level you're at! If Internet is available, we'll have an online learning demo, if not, there will be books and phrasebooks available for learners to practice read-aloud dialogues and drills. A couple of native speakers plan to attend to help us out. Hope to see a few new faces! :)

If you'd like some New Year's snacks, approx. $5 per person, pls rsvp! If you want to come late, please call to see if we're still there, or if you need directions (ask for Drew or Reece). :)

For more information, see www.qingping.org

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Chinese Language February Meetup TUESDAY
